clusterList.phrase: i know other families have losses some even have the unthinkable tragedy of losing a child but to lose a child to murder shattered one's belief in humanity
there were screams and people crying as they looked for their lost children
our heart goes out to the family and the friends of the victims
our heart goes out to everyone who has been affected by this tragedy
is a tragedy in and of itself
the loss of children is the most painful tragedy a family could have to endure
the loss of a son is never easy especially one who's so good

a tragedy such as this makes us acutely conscious of the beauty and fragility of our lives and those of our loved ones i am especially saddened by this intrusion of violence into a worship service involving children and youth i know that many people both in knoxville and around the country are struggling with shock and grief right now i pray that those so affected will find strength and comfort
